title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4250.10 - Loan fund accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4250.10 - Loan fund accounts

State Regulations

Each community based lending organization shall deposit
program funds awarded by the corporation, repayments, and interest earned into
a bank account in a State or Federal chartered banking
institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4250.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
